page.title: 15A DAY'S FOOD
page.content:
{SUNDAY 16th JUNE 1985 BREAKFAST SCRAMBLED EGG ON TOASTED BREAD.TEA WITH MILK. LUNCH GRILLED BACON AND SAUSAGES WITH BREAD AND MARGARINE.TEA WITH MILK DINNER BOILED POTATOES,CARROTS AND ROAST MEAT , WITH GRAVY. ICE CREAM AND TINNED PINEAPPLE SUPPER TEA WITH MILK,CHOCOLATE BISCUIT.
BETWEEN MEALS PEPPERMINT SWEETS ASSORTED CANDIES ONE APPLE {SUNDAY MEALS BY TRADITION ARE USUALLY {OF BETTER QUALITY IN N.IRELAND.THIS IS {AN ACTUAL DAY'S INTAKE OF AN 11 YEAR {OLD GIRL.CHILDRN EAT TOO MANY SWEETS.
